body:

I want to make my zone attribution look like chris mackey's one.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ylRDB7-m0MrSJ*u1PKN6bGWMqFn7CSNofCcJiFiYfp886YZmjfN9doqqs7UbJfrHGMOM2EA6REXGTi932wxoI5Apak43MAoD/Capture3.PNG)
Can anybody please tell me how can I make my zoner attribute look like the first one. Thank you.
